name: Graphuls
description:
Graphuls are small box like creatures. They have the ability to scale their body veritcally, and will scale themselves to match any other Graphuls they are stacked on top of. Your goal is to make stacks of Graphuls be the same size.

Controls:

Click on a Graphul to pick it up, click on another one to swap their spots.

Notice: By picking up a Graphul you can see it at it's actual size, unscaled by the stack it was in.
